person.content:

(Note: In the given paragraph, "lbw" stands for "leg before wicket," which is a cricket term for a type of dismissal, and does not refer to a person. Therefore, it was not included in the table.)

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: J. Adams lbw b Moody 5

| Location |
| --- |
| J. Adams lbw (Leg Before Wicket) |
| b (bowled) |
| Moody |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| J. Adams lbw (Leg Before Wicket) at |
| Moody's bowling |

Note: "bw" in "J. Adams lbw b Moody 5" stands for "bowled and hit wicket", but since "hit wicket" refers to the manner of dismissal and not a specific location, it was removed from the table. Instead, "at Moody's bowling" was added to indicate the general location of the event.
